refund.name: Refund
refund.description: You will now find a throwable once every 50 ammo pickups.

blending_in.name: Blending In
blending_in.description:
You gain access to all insider assets.
You gain +1 increased concealment.

walk-in_closet.name: Walk-in Closet
walk-in_closet.description:
Unlocks an armor bag equipment for you to use. The armor bag can be used to change your armor during a heist.
When wearing armor, your movement speed is 15% less affected.

fast_and_furious.name: Fast and Furious
fast_and_furious.description:
You do 5% more damage. Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.
Increases your doctor bag interaction speed by 20%.

brute_strength-1.name: Brute Strength
brute_strength-1.description: You grant 8% damage reduction for players in your group. This bonus is doubled for you when you are under 50% health.
brute_strength-1.vr_description: After dashing the player will heal from 0 up to a maximum of 3 health depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only heal a maximum of 50 health every 5 seconds.

marathon_man.name: Marathon Man
marathon_man.description:
You and your crew's stamina is increased by 50%.
Increases your shout distance by 25%.

wolf_pack.name: Wolf Pack
wolf_pack.description:
Your crew will gain 10% more health.
You will gain 20% more health.
Note: Crew perks do not stack.
wolf_pack.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 9.

testudo.name: Testudo
testudo.description:
You gain 10% more armor and your crew gains an additional 5% more armor.
Note: Crew perks do not stack.
testudo.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 12.

hostage_situation.name: Hostage Situation
hostage_situation.description:
You and your crew will gain 4% max health and 12% stamina for each hostage up to 4 times.
Note: Crew perks do not stack.
hostage_situation.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 15.

brute_strength-2.name: Brute Strength
brute_strength-2.vr_description: After dashing the player will heal from 0 up to a maximum of 3 health depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only heal a maximum of 50 health every 5 seconds.

meat_shield.name: Meat Shield
meat_shield.description:
You are 15% more likely to be targeted when you are close to your crew members.
You gain 10% more health.
meat_shield.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 6.

giant_strength.name: Giant Strength
giant_strength.description: You gain an additional 20% more health.
giant_strength.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 9.

disturbing_the_peace.name: Disturbing the Peace
disturbing_the_peace.description:
All firearms have a chance to spread panic among your enemies.
Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
disturbing_the_peace.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 12.

frenzied.name: Frenzied
frenzied.description:
When your health gets below 25% you will be immune to health damage for 2 seconds.
This cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.

800-pound_gorilla.name: 800-pound Gorilla
800-pound_gorilla.description: You gain an additional 40% more health.

type_2_armor.name: Type II Armor
type_2_armor.description: You gain an additional 5% more armor.

type_3_armor.name: Type III Armor
type_3_armor.description: You gain an additional 5% more armor.

reinforced_armor.name: Reinforced Armor
reinforced_armor.description:
Your armor recovery rate is increased by 10%.
When your armor gets depleted you will be immune to health damage for 2 seconds. This cannot occur more often than once every 45 seconds.

liquid_armor.name: Liquid Armor
liquid_armor.description:
Reduces the armor recovery time for you and your crew by 10%.
Note: Crew perks do not stack.

liquid_reinforcement.name: Liquid Reinforcement
liquid_reinforcement.description: Your armor recovery rate is increased by 15%.

carbon_plating.name: Carbon Plating
carbon_plating.description: When wearing armor, your movement speed is 20% less affected.

impact_diffusion.name: Impact Diffusion
impact_diffusion.description: Your armor blocks 25% of the damage when fully regenerated.

failsafe_protocol.name: Failsafe Protocol
failsafe_protocol.description:
When your armor gets depleted you will be immune to health damage for 2 seconds.
This cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.

subtle-1.name: Subtle
subtle-1.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by 5%.

elusive.name: Elusive
elusive.description: If you do not lose any armor or health for 4 seconds, you gain 10% dodge chance for 6 seconds.

evasive.name: Evasive
evasive.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by an additional 5%.

shadow_warrior.name: Shadow Warrior
shadow_warrior.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by an additional 5%.

killer_instinct.name: Killer Instinct
killer_instinct.description:
If you do not lose any armor or health for 4 seconds, you gain 20% critical hit chance for 6 seconds.	Critical hits deal 200% damage.
Note: Critical hit damage can be increased by the Aced Low Blow skill.

death_in_motion.name: Death in Motion
death_in_motion.description: Getting 3 headshot kills in less than 5 seconds increases your chance to dodge by 10% for 5 seconds.

controlled_chaos.name: Controlled Chaos
controlled_chaos.description: When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, your chance to dodge is increased by 10%.

dead_mans_dance.name: Dead Man's Dance
dead_mans_dance.description: Getting 3 headshot kills in less than 5 seconds increases your chance to dodge by an additional 10% for 5 seconds.

blood_debt.name: Blood Debt
blood_debt.description: When you get downed, you have a 20% chance to instantly get revived.

baba_yaga.name: Baba Yaga
baba_yaga.description:
Getting 3 headshot kills in less than 5 seconds increases the chance of Blood Debt occuring by 3%.
Stacks an indefinite amount of times.	Stacks are reset upon a successful occurance of Blood Debt.

basic_recovery.name: Basic Recovery
basic_recovery.description: Your armor recovery rate is increased by 5%.
basic_recovery.vr_description: After dashing the player will regenerate from 2 up to a maximum of 6 armor depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only occur 3 times every 3 seconds.

ambidexterity.name: Ambidexterity
ambidexterity.description:
Dual wielded weapons have a -16 stability penalty.
Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional 10%.
Ammo capacity for your akimbo weapons are increased by 50%.
ambidexterity.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 4 up to a maximum of 10.
ambidexterity.copycat_description:
Dual wielded weapons have a -16 stability penalty.
Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional 15%.
Ammo capacity for your akimbo weapons are increased by 50%.

advanced_recovery.name: Advanced Recovery
advanced_recovery.description: Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional 10%.
advanced_recovery.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 6 up to a maximum of 14.

expert_recovery.name: Expert Recovery
expert_recovery.description: Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional 10%.
expert_recovery.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 8 up to a maximum of 18.

ballistic_cardio.name: Ballistic Cardio
ballistic_cardio.description: Your stamina loss from being hit is reduced by 30% with ballistic vests.

kevlar_layer.name: Kevlar Layer
kevlar_layer.description: Your ballistic vests now grant 25% bullet damage resistance to your health.

double_lined.name: Double Lined
double_lined.description: Your ballistic vests can no longer be penetrated by armor piercing rounds.

plated_core.name: Plated Core
plated_core.description: Your armor with ballistic vests is increased by 25%.

unyielding.name: Unyielding
unyielding.description: Your ballistic vests are now immune to armor suppression.

sneaky.name: Sneaky
sneaky.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by 10%.

bag_of_tricks.name: Bag of Tricks
bag_of_tricks.description:
Standing still and crouching decreases your chances to be targeted by 10%.
You bag corpses 20% faster.

luck_of_the_irish.name: Luck of the Irish
luck_of_the_irish.description:
Your chance to dodge is increased by an additional 5%.
Your chance to be targeted while standing still and crouching is decreased by an additional 5%.
You pick locks 20% faster.

dutch_courage.name: Dutch Courage
dutch_courage.description:
Your chance to be targeted while standing still and crouching is decreased by an additional 5%.
You answer pagers 10% faster.
dutch_courage.copycat_description:
Your chance to dodge is increased by 20%.
Standing still and crouching decreases your chance of being targeted by 20%.

ricochet.name: Ricochet
ricochet.description: Dodged bullets will now ricochet back to the enemy that fired them.

breath_of_fresh_air.name: Breath of Fresh Air
breath_of_fresh_air.description:
Standing still and crouching increases your armor recovery rate by 20%.
You gain 10% crouching movement speed.
breath_of_fresh_air.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 10%.

overdog.name: OVERDOG
overdog.description:
When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, you receive 12% less damage from enemies.
Your second and each consecutive melee hit within 1 second of the last one will deal 10 times its normal damage.

basic_close_combat.name: Basic Close Combat
basic_close_combat.description: When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive 8% less damage from enemies.

advanced_close_combat.name: Advanced Close Combat
advanced_close_combat.description:
When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive an additional 8% less damage from enemies.
When your melee damage boost is active, the time limit between successive hits is now 7 seconds.

expert_close_combat.name: Expert Close Combat
expert_close_combat.description: When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive an additional 8% less damage from enemies.
expert_close_combat.copycat_description: When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive 24% less damage from enemies.

life_drain.name: Life Drain
life_drain.description: Striking an enemy with your melee weapon regenerates 40 health. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

tension.name: Tension
tension.description:
Killing an enemy regenerates 30 armor.
This cannot occur more than once every 1 second.
You gain an additional 10% more armor.

clean_hit.name: Clean Hit
clean_hit.description:
Killing an enemy with a melee weapon regenerates 90 armor.
This cannot occur more than once every 1 second.
When you are within medium range of an enemy you receive 8% less damage.

overdose.name: Overdose
overdose.description:
Killing an enemy at medium range recovers 30 armor.
This cannot occur more than once every 1 second.
You gain an additional 10% more armor.

showdown.name: Showdown
showdown.description:
Killing an enemy at medium range has a 75% chance to spread panic among your enemies.
Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
This cannot occur more than once every 1 second.

medical_supplies.name: Medical Supplies
medical_supplies.description: Ammo packs you pick up also yield medical supplies which heal you for 2 health.

ammo_give_out.name: Ammo Give Out
ammo_give_out.description: When you pick up ammo, you trigger an ammo pickup for 25% of normal pickup to the other players in your team.

sharing_is_caring.name: Sharing Is Caring
sharing_is_caring.description: When you get healed from picking up ammo packs, your teammates also get healed for 50% of the amount.

affordable_care_act.name: Affordable Care Act
affordable_care_act.description:
Health gained from ammo packs is increased by 100%.
You gain 20% more health.

long_arm_of_the_crime.name: Long Arm of the Crime
long_arm_of_the_crime.description: Your ammo pick up range is increased by 100%.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description:
You gain 30% extra health.
All of your armor is converted and applied to your health.
adrenaline.copycat_description:
Damaging an enemy heals 2 life points every 0.3 seconds for 3 seconds.
This effect stacks but cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds, and only while wearing the Two-piece Suit or Lightweight Ballistic Vest.

endorphins.name: Endorphins
endorphins.description: Scoring a headshot will heal you for 5 health.

dopamine.name: Dopamine
dopamine.description: You gain an additional 30% extra health.

euphoria.name: Euphoria
euphoria.description:
Damaging an enemy will regenerate 3 health every 0.3 seconds for 3 seconds.
This effect stacks but cannot occur more than once every 1 second.

koi_irezumi.name: Koi Irezumi
koi_irezumi.description: The lower your health, the faster your armor recovers. You will gain up to 30% armor recovery rate.

tora_irezumi.name: Tora Irezumi
tora_irezumi.description: The lower your health, the more armor recovery rate you have. When your health is below 25%, you will gain up to an additional 20% armor recovery rate.
tora_irezumi.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 6 up to a maximum of 14.

ryu_irezumi.name: Ryu Irezumi
ryu_irezumi.description:
The lower your health, the more likely you are to dodge.
You will gain up to 40% dodge.

oni_irezumi.name: Oni Irezumi
oni_irezumi.description:
The lower your health, the more damage you do.
You will do up to 30% more damage with ranged weapons.

point_break.name: Point Break
point_break.description:
While your armor is up, you will store 1 health for every 1 enemy you or your crew kills.
When your armor has been completely depleted and then starts to regenerate, you will gain health equal to the stored health amount.
Maximum amount of stored health depends on your equipped armor.

the_emerging_force.name: The Emerging Force
the_emerging_force.description: Increases the amount of health stored from kills by 2.
the_emerging_force.copycat_description:
While your armor is up, you will store 8 health for every 1 enemy you or your crew kills.
When your armor has been completely depleted and then starts to regenerate, you will gain health equal to the stored health amount.
Maximum amount of stored health depends on your equipped armor.
You gain 10% more health.

life_of_ice.name: Life of Ice
life_of_ice.description:
Increases the maximum health that can be stored by 50%.
Your chance to dodge is increased by 5%.
life_of_ice.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 9.

awakening_earth.name: Awakening Earth
awakening_earth.description: Increases the amount of health stored from kills by 2.

the_perfect_line.name: The Perfect Line
the_perfect_line.description: Killing an enemy speeds up your armor recovery time depending on how much armor you have. The more armor the less recovery speed gained per kill.	Armor recovery speed is reset whenever your armor recovers.

excitement.name: Excitement
excitement.description:
100% of damage you deal is converted into Hysteria Stacks, up to 240 every 4 seconds. Max amount of stacks is 600.
Hysteria Stacks:	You gain 1 damage absorption for every 75 stacks of Hysteria. Hysteria Stacks decays 60% + 80 every 8 seconds.

outburst.name: Outburst
outburst.description:
Members of your crew also gains the effect of your Hysteria Stacks.
Hysteria Stacks from multiple crew members do not stack and only the stacks that gives the highest damage absorption will have an effect.
All firearms have a chance to spread panic among your enemies. Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
outburst.copycat_description:
100% of damage you deal is converted into Hysteria Stacks, up to 240 every 4 seconds. Max amount of stacks is 600.
Hysteria Stacks:	You gain 1 damage absorption for every 30 stacks of Hysteria. Hysteria Stacks decays 60% + 80 every 8 seconds.
Members of your crew also gains the effect of your Hysteria Stacks.
Hysteria Stacks from multiple crew members do not stack and only the stacks that gives the highest damage absorption will have an effect.

fervor.name: Fervor
fervor.description: Change the decay of your Hysteria Stacks to 60% + 40 every 8 seconds.

recklessness.name: Recklessness
recklessness.description: Change the damage absorption of your Hysteria Stacks on you and your crew to 1 damage absorption for every 60 stacks of Hysteria.

insanity.name: Insanity
insanity.description: Damage absorption from Hysteria Stacks on you is increased by 50%.

blitzkrieg_bop.name: Blitzkrieg Bop
blitzkrieg_bop.description:
Instead of fully regenerating armor when out of combat, The Anarchist will continuously regenerate armor throughout the entire combat. Heavier armor regenerates more armor, but during longer intervals.
Note: Skills and perks that increases the armor recovery rate are disabled when using this perk deck.

straight_edge.name: Straight Edge
straight_edge.description: 75% of your health is converted into armor. Heavier armor receives a better conversion rate.

death_or_glory.name: Death or Glory
death_or_glory.description: Scoring a headshot grants you armor. Heavier armor regenerates more armor, but with longer intervals.

rise_above.name: Rise Above
rise_above.description: Your health loss during conversion is reduced to 50%. Armor increase is unaffected.

lust_for_life.name: Lust for Life
lust_for_life.description: Dealing damage grants you armor. Heavier armor regenerates more armor, but with longer intervals.

prospect.name: Prospect
prospect.description: Every time you or your crew performs a kill you will gain 7.5 health and 5 armor. This cannot occur more than 2 times every 16 seconds.

tail_gunner.name: Tail Gunner
tail_gunner.description: Every 10% health missing will increase the amount of armor gained from kills by 1.

road_captain.name: Road Captain
road_captain.description: Every 1/6 health missing will reduce the 16 second cooldown to kill regen by 1 second.

sgt-at-arms.name: Sgt-at-Arms
sgt-at-arms.description: Every 10% armor missing will increase the amount of health gained from kills by 1.

prez.name: Prez
prez.description: Every 1/6 armor missing will reduce the 16 second cooldown to kill regen by 1 second.

bad_guy_coming_through.name: Bad Guy Coming Through
bad_guy_coming_through.description:
Unlocks and equips the Kingpin Injector. Changing to another perk deck will make the Injector unavailable again. The Injector replaces your current throwable, is equipped in your throwable slot and can be switched out if desired.
While in game you can use the throwable key to activate the injector. Activating the injector will heal you with 75% of all damage taken as well as halve the aimpunch from getting hit for 6 seconds.
You can still take damage during the effect. The Injector can only be used once every 45 seconds.
bad_guy_coming_through.copycat_description:
Unlocks and equips the Kingpin Injector.
Activating the Injector will heal you with 75% of all damage taken for 6 seconds.
You can still take damage during the effect. The Injector can only be used once every 30 seconds.
Unlisted effect: Every kill reduces the cooldown by 1 second.

public_enemy_no_1.name: Public Enemy No. 1
public_enemy_no_1.description:
You gain 10% more health.
Enemies nearby will prefer targeting you, whenever possible, while the Injector effect is active.

balls_vs_bullets.name: Balls vs Bullets
balls_vs_bullets.description:
You gain 20% more health.
The amount of health received during the Injector effect is increased by 25% while below 50% health.

right_to_the_top.name: Right to the Top
right_to_the_top.description: For every 5 points of health gained during the injector effect while at maximum health, the recharge time of the injector is reduced by 1 second.

smoker.name: Smoker
smoker.description:
Unlocks and equips the throwable Smoke Bomb.
When deployed, the smoke bomb creates a smoke screen that lasts for 10 seconds. While standing inside the smoke screen, you and any of your allies automatically avoid 50% of all bullets. Any enemies that stand in the smoke will see their accuracy reduced by 50%.
After the smoke screen dissipates, the Smoke Bomb is on a cooldown for 60 seconds, but killing enemies will reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

twitch.name: Twitch
twitch.description: Every time the player gets shot, 10% dodge chance is gained. This effect is reset once the player dodges and will not occur for the next 1 second.

subtle-3.name: Subtle
subtle-3.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by 15%.

unseen_shadow.name: Unseen Shadow
unseen_shadow.description: All of your perk deck effects are increased by 100% while you are standing in the smoke screen. While any of your allies are standing in the smoke screen, they gain 10% dodge chance.

breathe_deep.name: Breathe Deep
breathe_deep.description: While inside your smoke screen, you and your crew's armor regenerates 30% faster and cannot be suppressed.

smog_layer.name: Smog Layer
smog_layer.description: While inside your smoke screen, you and your crew gain 25% dodge chance.

lingering_shadows.name: Lingering Shadows
lingering_shadows.description: While the smoke screen is active, you and your crew will retain its effect for 3 seconds after exiting it.

virtue.name: Virtue
virtue.description:
Unlocks and equips the Stoic Hip Flask.
Damage taken is now reduced by 75%. The remaining damage will be applied directly.
The 75% reduced damage will be applied over-time (12 seconds) instead.
You can use the throwable key to activate the Stoic Hip Flask and immediately negate any pending damage. The flask has a 16 second cooldown but time remaining will be lessened by 1 second per enemy killed.

un-moved.name: Un-moved
un-moved.description: All of your armor is converted and applied to your health.

calm.name: Calm
calm.description: After not taking damage for 4 seconds any damage-over-time you are still waiting to receive will be negated.

imperturbable.name: Imperturbable
imperturbable.description: When your health is below 35%, the cooldown of your flask will be reduced by 2 seconds for each enemy you kill instead of 1 second.

enduring.name: Enduring
enduring.description: When damage-over-time is removed you will be healed for an additional 50% of the damage-over-time remaining at that point.

soul_mates.name: Soul Mates
soul_mates.description:
Unlocks and equips the Gas Dispenser.
To activate the Gas Dispenser you need to look at another allied unit within a 18 meter radius with clear line of sight and press the throwable key to tag them.
Each enemy you or the tagged unit kills will now heal you for 5 health and the tagged unit for 5 health.
Each enemy you kill will now extend the duration of the effect by 1.3 seconds and reduce the cooldown timer by 2 seconds.
The effect will last for a duration of 12 seconds and has a cooldown of 60 seconds.

scent.name: Scent
scent.description: Your maximum health is increased by 20%.

synergy.name: Synergy
synergy.description:
Each enemy you or the tagged unit kills will now grant you 1.5 absorption up to a maximum of 6.
This effect will last until the perk deck item goes out of cooldown.

inhale.name: Inhale
inhale.description: Your maximum health is increased by 20%.

harmony.name: Harmony
harmony.description: Each enemy the tagged unit kills will now reduce your perk deck item cooldown timer by 2 seconds until you are no longer paired.

code_glitch.name: Code Glitch
code_glitch.description:
Unlocks and equips the Pocket ECM Device.
Changing to another perk deck will make the Pocket ECM Device unavailable again. The Pocket ECM Device replaces your current throwable, it can be switched out if desired.
While in game you can use the throwable key to activate the Pocket ECM Device.
Activating the Pocket ECM Device before the alarm is raised will trigger the jamming effect, disabling all electronics and pagers for a 6 second duration.
Activating the Pocket ECM Device after the alarm is raised will trigger the feedback effect, granting a chance to stun enemies on the map every second for a 6 second duration.
The Pocket ECM Device has 2 charges with a 100 second cooldown timer, but each kill you perform will shorten the cooldown time by 6 seconds.

bit_decay.name: Bit Decay
bit_decay.description:
Killing an enemy while the feedback effect is active will regenerate 15 health.
Your chance to dodge is increased by 5%.

botnet.name: Botnet
botnet.description: Crew members killing enemies while the feedback effect is active will regenerate 5 health.

momentum.name: Momentum
momentum.description:
Unlocks and equips the Leech Ampule.
Changing to another perk deck will make the Leech Ampule unavailable again. The Leech Ampule replaces your current throwable, is equipped in your throwable slot and can be switched out if desired.
While in game you can use throwable key to activate the Leech Ampule.
Activating the Leech Ampule will fully restore your health and disables your armor for the duration of the Leech Ampule.
While the Leech Ampule is active, your health is divided into segments of 20% and damage taken from enemies removes one segment. Killing 1 enemy will block damage for 0.45 seconds. Anytime you take damage, your teammates are healed for 1.5 health.
The Leech Ampule lasts 4 seconds with a 60 second cooldown.

indomitable.name: Indomitable
indomitable.description: Your maximum health is increased by 20%.	While the Leech Ampule is active you cannot go into bleedout, but being out of health will slow you down by 80%.

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.description: The Leech Ampule duration is increased to 8 seconds.	Killing an enemy reduces the cooldown of the Leech Ampule by 1 second(s).	Taking damage now heals teammates for 3 health.

built_different.name: Built Different
built_different.description: Your maximum health is increased by 20%.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.description:
While the Leech Ampule is active, your health is now divided into segments of 6.25%.
Your maximum health is increased by 40%.

tactical_reload.name: Tactical Reload
tactical_reload.description:
Auto-reload secondary after performing 10 kills with primary, and vice versa.

Increases weapon swapping speed by 320%.

head_games.name: Head Games
head_games.description: Each headshot you land heals 10 health points.

is_this_your_bullet.name: Is This Your Bullet?
is_this_your_bullet.description: Dodged bullets will ricochet back on the enemy that fired them.

grace_period.name: Grace Period
grace_period.description:
When your health gets below 50% you will be immune to health damage for 2 seconds.

This cannot occur more than once every 15 seconds.

thriving.name: Thriving
thriving.description: Your maximum health is increased by 20%.

cat-like_reflex.name: Cat-Like Reflex
cat-like_reflex.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by 5%.

fleet-footed.name: Fleet-Footed
fleet-footed.description: Your crouched and carry movement speed is increased by 10%.
